alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 9:26PM CDT until June 11 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Johnson County in north central Texas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 926 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Joshua, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Burleson, Cleburne, Keene, Joshua, Alvarado, Venus, Grandview, Godley, Cross Timber, Cleburne State Park, Lake Pat Cleburne, Parker, Rio Vista, Cresson, Briaroaks, Coyote Flats, Sand Flat, Egan and Lillian. This includes Interstate 35W between mile markers 14 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
